lead_paragraph: Halliburton, which provides well-drilling services for oil companies, is cutting jobs as the energy industry continues to struggle with slumping oil prices.

headline.print_headline: Halliburton to Cut 5,000 Jobs as Result of Lower Oil Prices
headline.main: Halliburton to Cut 5,000 Jobs as Result of Lower Oil Prices

snippet: Halliburton, which provides well-drilling services for oil companies, is cutting jobs as the energy industry continues to struggle with slumping oil prices.
abstract: Oil field service firm Halliburton says it is cutting 5,000 more jobs due to falling oil prices.
